belongs_to_collection.name: In Search of Walt Whitman Collection

original_title: In Search of Walt Whitman, Part One: The Early Years (1819-1860)
overview: Walt Whitman rises from a hardscrabble boyhood in Long Island and Brooklyn to write the masterpiece Leaves of Grass in 1855 that revolutionizes literature. Many of his most famous poems are profiled.
title: In Search of Walt Whitman, Part One: The Early Years (1819-1860)
